legacy.full_text: RT @globaltimesnews: #Comment: Are you seriously calling a city with such bustling streets a "ghost town?" The selection of three photos de…

legacy.description: China's national English language newspaper, under the People's Daily. Apps: https://t.co/S9E7BpFVPI
legacy.name: Global Times

result.text: #Comment: Are you seriously calling a city with such bustling streets a "ghost town?" The selection of three photos depicting empty streets, without specifying the time, is not only unprofessional but also raises a big question over the motives behind badmouthing China's economy. The narrative of a "China in collapse" is nothing new. Haven't the numerous instances in which this false narrative has been proven wrong by China's actual economic performance been sufficient?🙄

legacy.description: Michael Yon is America's most experienced combat correspondent. Traveled or worked in 95 countries, including various wars/conflicts.
legacy.name: Michael Yon: Callsign BIG HONEY 6

result.text:
From a friend in China: “…flew from [xxxx] to Shanghai. Of all the places I travel, China is showing the most signs of an economy in trouble. Deep trouble. Shanghai is a ghost town compared to what it was. It’s their financial hub. Used to have massive western presence. Today is Monday. Normal workday. It feels like a Sunday morning in Germany. Very quiet.  Very little road traffic. Western restaurants used to be a real status symbol to eat in. Now they’re empty. Our freight loads out of here are half of what they used to be. China is in trouble.”

These photos from today.  These places were full pre-covid.  (Must all be in America and Europe).

#Comment:
*Huawei has faced significant challenges due to long-term comprehensive sanctions imposed by 🇺🇸, which have restricted Huawei's access to advanced technology and components from 🇺🇸 suppliers.
*But 🇺🇸 sanctions did not kill Huawei, they made Huawei stronger.
*The release of #Mate60 is a souvenir for @SecRaimondo – a display of the resilience of Chinese tech companies and their ability to survive and thrive.
